class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        count = n-1
        l = [i for i in range(n)]
            
        res = []
        for query in queries:
            #print(l)
            left = bisect.bisect_right(l, query[0])
            right = bisect.bisect_left(l, query[1])
            for i in range(right-1, left-1, -1):
                l.pop(i)
                count -= 1
            res.append(count)
        #print(l)
            
        return res
